name: Rescue from Fort Shikigami
description:
!!!Work-in-progress!!!

Please email me feedback about the game: daminkaneo at the ol' mail of g(oogle) website.

Controls:

Left/Right - move
Left shift - jump
C - switch weapon
Press and hold X - fire weapon

Arrows can kill enemies, rocks can distract enemies with sound, fire can light up the background to see better. Collect the divine puppy at the end of the level to win!
